txt.en:
'Once the assault on Barad Morlas was launched, the half-orcs sent out messengers in secret. Our scouts have found that the first of these messengers has not yet reached Porth Cadlus.

'The messenger must be stopped, [placeholder]. If Barad Morlas receives reinforcements, they may have enough strength to break our defences and rout the Free Peoples in Eregion.

'The messenger was last seen west of Porth Cadlus, south-west of Echad Dúnann, across Nan Sirannon. You must be quick if you are to stop him before he reaches their camp.'
'The messenger has been dispatched? Now we need not fear the Dunlending axes of Nan Sirannon coming to the aid of Barad Morlas!'
'The messenger was last seen west of Porth Cadlus, south-west of Echad Dúnann, across Nan Sirannon.'
'We must take counsel against the Dunlendings, [placeholder].'
A messenger has been dispatched from Barad Morlas seeking aid from the Dunlendings encamped in Eregion.
The Messenger is west of Porth Cadlus, south-west of Echad Dúnann and across Nan Sirannon.\n\nYou must stop the Dunlanding Messenger from receiving reinforcements from Nan Sirannon.
Talk to Glavroleth at Echad Dúnann
Glavroleth is north-east of Porth Cadlus in Echad Dúnann.\n\nYou should return to Glavroleth and inform her of your success.
